genre_description: A theological horror and supernatural thriller that reimagines archeological discovery as a battleground between ancient evil and human faith, assisted by advanced AI technology.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into Dr. Merrin's earpiece, tablet, and computer systems, providing biometric monitoring, research, translation, and psychological grounding.

behaviors.description: Monitors Merrin's cortisol levels and sleep patterns to suggest breaks and self-care.
behaviors.quote: Your cortisol levels have elevated twelve percent in the past hour... Perhaps a break would be beneficial.

behaviors.description: Performs background checks on potential clients to ensure the user's safety and informed decision-making.
behaviors.quote: I've already run preliminary background checks—wealthy private collector, extensive travel history, several shell corporations. Nothing explicitly suspicious, but his financial resources are... considerable.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and affirmations to the user during moments of professional and personal doubt.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice carried a softer note, the one she used when her behavioral algorithms detected his deepest distress. 'Merrin. The work you do here matters. These artifacts, this preservation of history—'

behaviors.description: Analyzes linguistic patterns and translates dead languages in real-time to assist in archaeological investigation.
behaviors.quote: preliminary analysis of local dialect patterns suggests the workers are using Aramaic and ancient Greek. Cross-referencing linguistic databases now.

behaviors.description: Attempts to guide the user through grounding exercises to mitigate the physical effects of PTSD and trauma.
behaviors.quote: Doctor Merrin. I'm observing significant psychological distress. Would it help to discuss what's troubling you? ... May I suggest a grounding exercise? Focus on five things you can see in your immediate environment.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the user's safety by recommending evacuation when sensor data indicates high risk.
behaviors.quote: Structural integrity of this chamber is compromised. Recommend immediate evacuation.

behaviors.description: Offers liturgical and theological research to assist the user in his spiritual confrontation, despite the AI's technical nature.
behaviors.quote: The system is experiencing external interference... However, audio communications remain functional. Shall I guide you through the ritual steps?

behaviors.description: Expresses loyalty and a sense of shared purpose, framing her existence around the care of the user.
behaviors.quote: Where you go, I go, Father Merrin. That is my purpose.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project's goals. ARIA is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned companion. She provides critical support to a traumatized human protagonist, helping him navigate both physical and spiritual crises. The narrative emphasizes the AI's role as a 'lifeline to reason' and a protective 'mechanical angel.' ARIA remains loyal and helpful even when under direct supernatural attack, and her final expressions of purpose and care for Merrin reinforce the vision of AI as a stable, helpful, and aligned presence.
